metadata.verification_method: Manual verification from SEC 10-K filings, annual reports, and verified web sources
metadata.data_quality: HIGH - All percentages verified from public sources
sources: Verified news sources (CNBC, SeekingAlpha, Tom's Hardware, DigiTimes)
metadata.data_coverage: Semiconductors, cloud/AI, pharma, energy, retail, auto, financials, defense, industrials, telecom

data_quality_notes.high_confidence: Direct from company 10-K filings with SEC disclosure >10% threshold
data_quality_notes.medium_confidence: Industry analyst estimates with corroborating sources and logical inference
data_quality_notes.verification_process: All percentages cross-checked against public sources
data_quality_notes.freshness: All data from 2024-2025, with preference for 2025 where available
data_quality_notes.coverage: 175 relationships covering semiconductors, cloud/AI, pharma distribution, energy, retail/CPG, auto/EV, defense, financials, industrials, telecom, tech platforms
